Class ShadowedTextApplet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      applet.ShadowedTextApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ShadowedTextApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Applet interface to the ShadowedTextFrame class. Requires Swing and Java 2D.

Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press, http://www.coreservlets.com/. © 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
